name: 方圓
objective:
期待透過理論與案例幫助同學理解「金融科技」之內涵、應用與相關議題，包括改變付款方式的破壞力、分析變化中的監管環境，還有機器人理財（自動化投資顧問） 、行動銀行、純網銀、開放銀行、P2P借貸、眾籌等，並對雲端運算、大數據、人工智慧、區塊鏈等技術於金融領域之應用，有更深入的了解。

The course goal is to help the students to understand FinTech and introduce the fundamental building blocks of financial technologies and real-world applications through case studies which include the disruptive force of changing payment methods, analyze the changing regulatory landscape, and gain a deeper understanding of mobile banking, open banking, robo-advisor, crowdfunding, peer-to-peer lending, blockchain and so on.
